column5: My place is about 30 minutes to DFW Airport  Adjacent to Pilot Knoll Park with; Boating, Fishing, Kayak and Paddleboard rentals, and Horse trails to ride (Horse and boat rental recommendations available upon request).  Hot tub available to guests. whole foods market 5 minutes from my house casual to fine dining 5 minutes away at the shops of highland village   Youâ€™ll love my place because of the outdoors space, it's good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
